awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.

fullplot: When a tough New Yorker's mother is stricken with a serious illness, she is forced to quit her job and her relationship with her boyfriend to take care of her, finding out a lot of things she didn't know about her mother and father and her life along the way.
plot: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.
title: One True Thing

tomatoes.consensus: Solid performances lift this drama to a higher level.
